name: Anti-Dandruff Colour Protect Hair Mask
tagline: Preserve your hair colour while providing extra nourishment & care.
directions: Apply on damp hair, leave for 20 minutes then wash your hair as usual. Use twice a week. For best results use with Meraki’s Hair Growth Hair Serum.
description: Our fermented rice cream provides essential nutrients and amino acids while omega-3 fatty acids from our organic flaxseed gel strengthen hair, reduce breakage and add shine. Cloves stimulate blood circulation; turmeric contains curcumin, an antioxidant with anti-inflammatory properties that soothe the scalp and reduce dandruff. Combined with the conditioning & hydrating benefits of coconut milk and ricinoleic acid in castor oil, this mask helps stimulate hair follicles, promote growth & reduce hair loss. Rosemary and caffeine also help reduce hair fall, stimulate follicles & encourage growth.

name: Hair Growth Hair Serum
tagline: Grows hair as fast as the wind blows.
directions: Apply a few drops of this non-greasy serum on wet hair, massage your scalp gently, and comb your hair to disperse it evenly. In 2 to 3 weeks you will see visible growth and reduced hair fall. Can also be applied on scalp at night daily for rapid growth and repair. Stinging may occur as a healing indicator.
description: A powerhouse blend of amino acids, essential fatty acids, vitamins & antifungal/antibacterial agents. Soothes the scalp and provides a concentrated dose of nourishing and growth-promoting properties. Ingredients stimulate blood circulation, strengthen hair, moisturize, and reduce scalp issues.
note: Individual responses may vary. For significant hair loss or severe scalp issues, consult a dermatologist.

name: Anti Ageing Face & Body Soap Bar
tagline: Rejuvenate your skin, refresh your soul.
description: Our cold-process anti-ageing soap bar combines powerful natural ingredients: flaxseed for hydration & anti-inflammatory effects; fermented rice cream as a natural skin lightener and exfoliant; lavender for its antiseptic, calming properties; alum to tighten pores and brighten complexion; olive oil to restore the skin barrier; shea butter and coconut oil for nourishment; potato starch for brightening; and goat milk rich in vitamins A, B, B6, B12 and minerals to support collagen and reduce oxidative stress.
note: Always apply sunscreen before stepping out to protect from heat and sun damage.

name: Anti-Ageing Face Wash
tagline: Look flawless & pamper your skin with pure bliss.
directions: Apply on damp skin, massage for 30 seconds, then rinse. For best results, follow with Glass Glow Anti-Ageing Serum.
description: Our cold-process liquid face wash harnesses the anti-inflammatory and hydrating power of flaxseed; rice cream as a skin lightener and exfoliant; lavender’s antiseptic, anti-inflammatory benefits; alum to tighten and brighten pores; olive oil to restore the skin barrier; shea butter for nourishment; and potato starch for brightening. Goat milk’s vitamins and minerals support collagen and reduce oxidative stress.
note: Always apply sunscreen before stepping out to protect from heat and sun damage.

name: Glass Glow Face & Body Soap Bar
tagline: Be natural, be beautiful & glow like a superstar.
description: Our Glass Glow soap combines rice cream and aloe vera for hydration and elasticity; turmeric for inflammation, pigmentation, and acne; caffeine, cloves, and vitamin E for antioxidant protection and circulation; and glycerin for moisture retention, giving you flawless, glowing skin.
note: Always apply sunscreen before stepping out to protect from heat and sun damage.

name: Kiddy Soap Bar
tagline: Pure lather, happy tears. Organic soaps for little ones.
description: Carefully crafted, free of harmful chemicals and plastics, these soaps soothe dry skin, exfoliate with real rice and fruit pulp, and keep skin moisturized and soft.

name: Activated Charcoal, Turmeric & Kojic Acid Soap for Men
tagline: Target impurities and brighten your complexion.
description: Activated charcoal absorbs impurities and excess oil; turmeric and kojic acid reduce hyperpigmentation and dark spots; and moisturizing oils with shea butter hydrate and protect from environmental damage.
note: Always apply sunscreen before stepping out to protect from heat and sun damage.

name: Anti Acne Serum with 5% Niacinamide
tagline: Skin so clear, no filter needed.
directions: Apply a few drops on slightly damp face, massage gently upward, then follow with moisturizer. Use twice daily. Stinging may occur due to active ingredients.
description: This blend of natural ingredients with niacinamide and vitamin C promotes acne-free, youthful skin. Vitamins E and C neutralize free radicals; niacinamide and tea tree oil fight acne and inflammation; rice milk and flaxseed gel strengthen skin cells, reduce fine lines, and increase elasticity.
note: Always apply sunscreen before stepping out to protect from heat and sun damage.

name: Glow Me Good Anti Ageing Face Serum with 1% Hyaluronic Acid
tagline: Wrinkles are overrated, just skin care and chill.
directions: Apply a few drops on slightly damp face, massage gently upward. Use nightly on face and neck. Stinging may occur due to active ingredients.
description: Ideal for combination skin: frankincense and rosehip oils reduce wrinkles and promote elasticity; hyaluronic acid and glycerin deeply hydrate; alum tightens pores; rice milk and orange oil brighten and boost collagen; sweet almond oil nourishes; jojoba oil protects the skin barrier; flaxseed gel provides omega-3s for youthful glow.
note: Always apply sunscreen before stepping out to protect from heat and sun damage.
